name: mg94_ext

args.name: omega
args.description: Relative rate of non-synonymous changes relative to synonymous changes

title: An extended version of the Muse & Gaut (1994) model of codon substitution.

citation.title: A likelihood approach for comparing synonymous and nonsynonymous nucleotide substitution rates, with application to the chloroplast genome.

description: This is a version of the mg94 model that has been extended to use a user-supplied rate matrix `nuc_model` on nucleotides.  The original mg94 model is equivalent to `mg94_ext(f81)`.
